entity.name: Mages Guild
entity.entry:
By decree, Mages are required to register with the Mages Guild as a way to ‘understand’ and regulate magic within the city. This is a relatively new requirement implemented by Praetor [character:6801107] and it somewhat controversial since the membership was voluntary in the past. The 5 gp fee is considered nominal and covers the administrative cost of maintaining the registry as well as an annual fireworks party. 

Mages may advance in influence through the ranks by gaining [ability:6801106|renown]:

  • Hedge Mage - Pretty much pay your dues
  • Apprentice - A few favors for an Elder or a Master and you are good.
  • Initiate - Sharing a spell you crafted or competing in the [location:6808939]
  • Elder - Good luck, these guys are a tight bunch
  • Master - Secretive and unnamed.
